alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo; Luna (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 5:47PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest New Mexico, including the following counties, Hidalgo and Luna. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Camp Ramsey and Hermanas. Between 0.5 and 1.2 inches of rain have fallen. - Camp Ramsey and Hermanas is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Hermanas and Camp Ramsey. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
